testsuite.name: com.company.promotions.search.api.promotions.infrastructure.rest.FindProductsPriceGETControllerIT

testcase.name: Test 3: Request at 21:00 on day 14 - should return base price
Should return correct date range in response
Test 1: Request at 10:00 on day 14 - should return base price
Should accept second API key for rotation support
Test 2: Request at 16:00 on day 14 - should return promotional price
Should return 401 when API key is missing
Should return 401 when API key is invalid
Should return 400 when brandId is invalid
Test 4: Request at 10:00 on day 15 - should return promotional price
Should return 404 when no price applies
Test 5: Request at 21:00 on day 16 - should return late promotional price
Should return 400 when productId is invalid
